sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update mid_k8s_deployment table default values</description>
        <name>Update mid_k8s_deployment default values</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateDefaultValue(fieldName, newValue) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addQuery('name', 'mid_k8s_deployment');
    dictionaryGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    if (dictionaryGr.next()) {
        dictionaryGr.setValue("default_value", newValue);
        dictionaryGr.update();
        gs.info("Default value of mid_k8s_deployment." + fieldName + " set to " + newValue);
    } else {
        gs.log("Failed to update dictionary entry for table: mid_k8s_deployment could not find a valid dictionary record for field :" + fieldName);
    }
}
updateDefaultValue("ss_choice", 'true');
updateDefaultValue("security_context_fs_group", '');]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>now.midserver</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-12 23:37:41</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8196f8f007913110aba4d9630ad300f2</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update mid_k8s_deployment default values</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="MID Server" source="com.glideapp.agent">a6877ce83cb1311068bcf327dfe37f69</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_8196f8f007913110aba4d9630ad300f2</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>now.midserver</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-13 00:07:48</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
